product_overview: ChatBattles.ai is a cutting-edge AI chat platform that enables users to compare responses from three top AI models (GPT-5-Nano, Grok-4, DeepSeek v3.1) side-by-side in real-time using a unique Battle Mode interface. The platform supports advanced chat input, multimodal interactions, user authentication, and comprehensive chat history management, all presented within a sleek, futuristic neon-themed UI optimized for all devices.
core_goals: Provide a seamless interface for real-time side-by-side AI response comparisons using multiple AI models.
Enable authenticated users to securely sign in, manage their chat history, and perform batch actions on conversations.
Support rich multimodal communication including text, images, and document attachments with fallback vision AI capabilities.
Enhance user engagement through interactive features such as voting on AI responses and sharing battle results on social media.
Maintain a performant and visually appealing UX with animated backgrounds, smooth streaming responses, and consistent keyboard shortcuts for productivity.
key_features: AI Battle Mode displaying simultaneous streaming responses from three AI models with typewriter effect.
Advanced chat input supporting text, image, and document attachments with drag-and-drop functionality.
Secure and robust user authentication managed through Clerk with sign-in and sign-up flows.
Persistent chat history storage, with capabilities to search, filter, paginate, delete, and bulk manage conversations using Supabase database.
Maintaining conversation context to enable continuous multi-turn AI dialogues.
Multimodal input with intelligent image analysis and fallback descriptions for models without vision support.
Upvote and downvote voting system for users to express preferences on AI model responses.
Social media sharing and link copying to share battle results.
Keyboard shortcuts for common actions (submit, clear, new chat) to improve workflow efficiency.
Toast notifications for user feedback on actions such as success or errors.
Dynamic neon-themed animated gradient backgrounds and visually appealing UI elements using Framer Motion.
SEO optimized landing and static informational pages with metadata, sitemap, and robots configurations.
user_flow_summary: Users arrive at the landing page showcasing key product features and benefits with neon-themed UI.
New users sign up securely through Clerk authentication; returning users sign in to access full platform features.
Authenticated users enter Battle Mode chat interface where they input prompts, optionally upload attachments, and receive real-time streaming AI responses from three models side-by-side.
Users can interact with AI responses by voting on them and sharing results to social media or copying links.
Users access profile page to view, search, filter, paginate, delete or bulk manage their chat history with persistence across sessions.
Keyboard shortcuts enhance navigation and actions within the chat interface.
Throughout the experience, toast notifications provide real-time feedback on user actions and system statuses.
validation_criteria: Real-time side-by-side AI responses from all three models stream correctly with visible typewriter effect and minimal latency.
User authentication works securely via Clerk with proper session handling and restricted access to protected routes.
Chat history operations with Supabase backend (store, fetch, search, filter, delete, bulk actions) function correctly with data consistency.
Multimodal inputs correctly upload and process text, images, and documents, including fallback descriptions for unsupported vision.
Voting interactions register and persist user preferences accurately.
Social sharing functions correctly across major social platforms and link copying behaves as expected.
Keyboard shortcuts trigger the intended actions without conflicts or errors.
UI components including animated backgrounds, loading skeletons, toast notifications, and transitions render smoothly across supported devices and screen sizes.
Landing page and static pages include proper SEO metadata and load efficiently with no broken links or errors.
